data.title: OneRepublic Quiz
data.meta_description: Hey this is my first quiz. OneRepublic is my favorite band. Hope you enjoy it! Good luck! - test your knowledge in this quiz! (Author Bhawkslover97)
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. Who is the lead singer of OneRepublic?

Answer: Ryan Tedder

Ryan Tedder was born in Oklahoma on June 26, 1979. Besides singing/writing for OneRepublic Ryan has also written for Adele, Colbie Calliat, Leona Lewis, Jordan Sparks, and many more people. Using the Suzuki method, he was able teach himself piano at the age of three. Before writing and singing, Ryan was a waiter and an employee at Pottery Barn.

When he was 21, Ryan a songwriting contest and was chosen by the boy band N'Sync for the finals. He won the competition. His first song, "Apologize", became a smash hit.

2. Who is the lead guitarist of OneRepublic?

Answer: Zach Filkins

Besides being the lead guitarist, he has also been a model. His full name is Zach Douglas Filkins. He lived in Chicago but was convinced to move to LA by Ryan. Nine months later, the newly formed band would sign a record deal. Zach also made an appearance on "Criminal Minds" as a park ranger.

3. What city is OneRepublic from?

Answer: Colorado Springs, Colorado

They are an American rock band from Colorado Springs, Colorado. Ryan and some bandmates were from there and knew each other from school. They didn't realize that later, the friendship would lead them to form a band with many smash hits.

4. What was the first released album by OneRepublic?

Answer: Dreaming Out Loud

"Dreaming Out Loud" was the first album. It held songs like "Mercy", "Say (All I Need", "Stop and Stare", and "Apologize".

5. What song did Ryan Tedder sing alone and also with Sara Bareillis?

Answer: Come Home

Although he sings it alone on the CD, they've released videos as a duet.

6. When is Ryan Tedder's birthday?

Answer: June 26

He was born June 26th, 1979. He was born in Tulsa, Oklahoma and during his senior year he moved to Colorado.

7. What TV show (not a talk show) was Ryan Tedder on as himself?

Answer: Smash

Other guest stars on the first season of "Smash" were Uma Thurman and Nick Jonas.

8. Who was never a member of OneRepublic?

Answer: Rob Thomas

Tim Myers was a former member. Rob Thomas is the lead singer of Matchbox 20 and had a solo career.

9. What did Ryan Tedder not write?

Answer: Fix You

Ryan is really talented and has written songs for many people like Adele, Beyonce, Leona Lewis, Daughtry, JLO, and many more artists.

10. Which song was not from the second album, "Waking Up"?

Answer: Gravity

"Gravity" was an unreleased single along with "Ice", "The Look", and "Everything".

Source: Author Bhawkslover97

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor kyleisalive before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
